description.originalText:
Lindsay has been an amazing nanny for our infant daughter. She’s been with us for the last four months and our daughter LOVES Lindsay — she is so excited to see her in the morning, she practically jumps out of my arms into Lindsay’s!

Lindsay takes the initiative to come up with sensory activities, music play, and art projects for them to do, and is great about taking our daughter out of the house to go to the park, the library, or just for a fun walk. 

Lindsay is also excellent with her communication, updating us on what they’re doing and how our daughter is throughout the day with messages and adorable pictures. 

We whole heartedly recommend Lindsay as a nanny or babysitter. My husband and I know that our daughter is happy, safe and engaged when she is with Lindsay, and we trust her completely. Any family would be so lucky to have her!

Hiring Lindsay was the best decision I have ever made. Last year at the end of the summer we decided we need someone part time to watch our 30 months old daughter because our schedules were getting a but busy. This September Lindsay has been with us for a year and became a very important puzzle in our family! She is very flexible and accommodating, at no point ever I was worried leaving her with my daughter. Her energy is refreshing and my daughter enjoys being silly with her. They do tons of crafting and activities and have so much fun. She is also very patient and knows well how to de escalate a situation or attend to tantrums. She was also doing an amazing job when my daughter was sick. Our daughter started 3k this fall so we no longer use Lindsay regularly but she is always available if we need her for example for drop offs or nights out. She is part of our family, a birthday party canno happen without her. We have nothing but good things to say about Lindsay, she would go above snd beyond for your child!

description.displayText: Lindsay has been babysitting my daughter for years and is wonderful with children of all ages. If you are looking for a warmhearted, fun and creative person who you can trust to take excellent care of your kids, then Lindsay is the right sitter for you!
description.originalText: Lindsay has been babysitting my daughter for years and is wonderful with children of all ages. If you are looking for a warmhearted, fun and creative person who you can trust to take excellent care of your kids, then Lindsay is the right sitter for you!

description.displayText: Lindsay currently babysits my two year old son and is amazing with him. She and my son have done many creative art projects together because she knows how much my son loves art. She is thoughtful and kind and takes great care of him.  He always has a smile on his face when he's with her! I completely trust her with my son and I am so grateful he has her for a babysitter!
description.originalText: Lindsay currently babysits my two year old son and is amazing with him. She and my son have done many creative art projects together because she knows how much my son loves art. She is thoughtful and kind and takes great care of him.  He always has a smile on his face when he's with her! I completely trust her with my son and I am so grateful he has her for a babysitter!

description.displayText: My children love Lindsay. She knows to how to relate to kids of all ages and would get my kids to open up to her. She's fun, does arts and crafts, is reliable for picking up from school, getting off the bus, taking to music class and play groups, or even just the park. Date nights, mornings, she's done it all for me. She's the best.

She's fun, does arts and crafts, is reliable for picking up from school, getting off the bus, taking to music class and play groups, or even just the park. Date nights, mornings, she's done it all for me. She's the best.

description.displayText: Lindsay is a kind, responsible, loving and very fun babysitter.  Our two boys (7 and 8) love spending time with her. Highly recommend!
description.originalText: Lindsay is a kind, responsible, loving and very fun babysitter.  Our two boys (7 and 8) love spending time with her. Highly recommend!

description.displayText: Lindsay has babysat for my son and daughter for several years now, and she is always dependable and caring. She plans fun activities for them to do, and is flexible in taking them to the park or to a local indoor basketball court if they want to run around.  Lindsay is fun and enthusiastic, and my kids really enjoy her company. Most importantly, I trust her completely, and know my kids are well cared for and happy when they are in her care.  I plan to hire her again.
description.originalText: Lindsay has babysat for my son and daughter for several years now, and she is always dependable and caring. She plans fun activities for them to do, and is flexible in taking them to the park or to a local indoor basketball court if they want to run around.  Lindsay is fun and enthusiastic, and my kids really enjoy her company. Most importantly, I trust her completely, and know my kids are well cared for and happy when they are in her care.  I plan to hire her again.

description.displayText:
Lindsay is a wonderful caregiver for my two boys, ages 10 and 5. They always look forward to when she is coming. They really like her because she participates in whatever games or activities they are doing. She shows a genuine interest in what they are interested in.
We always feel comfortable leaving our boys with Lindsay. She is a very responsible and caring caregiver.
